revised_title: Higher Derivatives of the Riemann Zeta-Function and Stieltjes Constants
tldr: The article presents methods for calculating higher derivatives of the Riemann zeta-function accurately. It also discusses the Euler-Maclaurin summation method, formulas for Stieltjes constants, and the connection between the Riemann zeta-function and analytical number theory. The author provides extensive tables of calculated values and error bounds for the derivatives and constants.
